entry.title: Todo
entry.content:
Minimal style from http://gist.io/

Font colour #666666 / #444444

Font colours - black pixel #333333 main #787878 sub

<div class="bogus-wrapper">
<notextile>
<figure class="code">
<div class="highlight">
<table>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td class="gutter">
<pre class="line-numbers">

http://blog.dlecan.com/octopress-continous-integration/

Make octopress pages for cydia apps

http://jigsaw.w3.org/css-validator/validator?uri=http%3A%2F%2Fjmeosbn.github.com%2F&profile=css3&usermedium=all&warning=1&vextwarning=&lang=en

general

git-log - Show commit logs

git-blog(1) - Show a git user’s log

Add link to hackspace github etc?

Weird h1 link highlight issues

on mobile

add basic navigation to header (or link to jump to sidebar at end of page)

Force sidebar on for mobile
